content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on utilizing contentions and special issue indicators associated with claimed issues, including
identifying contentions
verifying contentions
additional fields for examination management
relating contentions to specific classifications in the pension management center (PMC)
associating claim types to contentions
entering a claim-specific special issue
, and
properly applying special issues
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F - Record Maintenance During the Development Process
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F
